short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Record and add voice note comments to pull requests on Github

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Are you tired of Zoom calls? Want more pointed discussions and faster Github pull request reviews? Github Voice Notes will let you record audio snippets and add them on Github pull request comments with only the click of a single button!
